name: Mienshao
description: The Martial Arts Pokémon. They use the long fur on their arms as a whip to strike their opponents.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to flinching.

abilities.name: Regenerator
abilities.description: Once per long rest, this Pokémon regains hit points equal to its level when it returns to its Pokéball.

abilities.name: Reckless
abilities.description: When attacking with moves with recoil damage, this Pokémon doubles its STAB bonus.
